resources.string: Como usar as Retransmisións de Lichess.
A nova rolda terá os mesmos membros e colaboradores cá rolda anterior.

string.name: completedHelp
string.comment: This string used to say "Lichess detects round completion based on the source games. Use this toggle if there is no source." but has since been streamlined along with the rest of the user interface. Please update translations as needed.

resources.string: Malia que Lichess detecta o final das roldas, pódese equivocar. Usa esta opción para facelo manualmente.

string.name: fullDescription
string.comment: This text used to say "Full event description". It can be changed to "tournament" since all broadcast events are tournaments.

string.name: fullDescriptionHelp
string.comment:
This text used to start with "Optional long description of the broadcast.". The word should be changed to "tournament" since all broadcast events are tournaments, and it is a more user-friendly term.
%1$s says "Markdown" (a proper noun) and gives a link to a description of Markdown. %2$s is the character limit (e.g. 160)

resources.string: Descrición longa opcional do torneo. %1$s está dispoñíbel. A lonxitude debe ser menor de %2$s caracteres.
URL de orixe do arquivo PGN
Ligazón que Lichess comprobará para obter actualizacións dos PGN. Debe ser publicamente accesíbel desde a Internet.
Até 64 identificadores de partidas de Lichess, separados por espazos.

string.name: startDateTimeZone
string.comment:
The date the real-life tournament starts, in the location it will take place.
%s is the date.

resources.string: Data de inicio do torneo (na zona horaria local): %s
Opcional, se sabes cando comeza o evento

string.name: definitivelyDeleteRound
string.comment:
Refers to live tournaments being broadcast on Lichess (https://lichess.org/broadcast).
Description (also translateable): Delete all games of this round. The source will need to be active in order to re-create them.
This string has been amended since its initial publication; it didn't say "all its games" at the time.

resources.string: Eliminar definitivamente a rolda e todas as súas partidas.
Eliminar todas as partidas desta rolda. A transmisión en orixe terá que estar activa para volver crealas.
Eliminar o torneo de forma definitiva, con todas as súas roldas e partidas.
Amosar os puntos dos xogadores en función dos resultados das partidas
Opcional: substituír os nomes dos xogadores, as puntuacións e os títulos
Opcional: canto tempo se agarda entre peticións. Min 2s, max 60s. Por defecto é automático baseado no número de espectadores.
